As the Campaign for Smart Justice’s Regional Field Director working in your community to reduce Oklahoma’s mass incarceration crisis, please allow me to introduce myself.

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

My name is Nick Singer and I am the Campaign for Smart Justice's regional field director in your community. In 2013, I made a career switch to focus on politics. Since then, I've worn many hats, organizer, candidate, activist, and lobbyist. Each role has fulfilled my desire to have a better, more responsive government that fights for the common good.

With the upcoming legislative session rapidly approaching us, I hope we can work together to make sure that those who were chosen to represent our values, do so. There will be a lot of opportunities to make your voice heard, including a Day of Action on Tuesday, February 19, and I hope I can count on you to help hold our elected officials accountable.

RSVP TODAY

In the meantime, please feel free to reach out to me by email at nsinger@acluok.org. I love being a part of the community and am always open to grab a cup of coffee and chat.

Thank you for your support.

Sincerely,

Nick Singer
Regional Field Director, ACLU of Oklahoma
